merge-world.title: Merge World
merge-world.slogan: Unleash Your Creativity in Merge World
merge-world.description: Merge World is a creative game where you blend colors skillfully to bring 3D objects to life, turning each one into a stunning work of art. Challenge your creativity and enjoy the satisfaction of crafting vibrant masterpieces in this immersive and artistic experience.

HomeIframe.title: Merge World - A Creative Color-Matching Game
HomeIframe.description: Dive into Merge World, where you can unleash your inner artist by blending colors to create stunning 3D art pieces. Experience the joy of creativity and the satisfaction of crafting vibrant masterpieces.

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Merge World is an innovative game that challenges you to blend colors skillfully, bringing 3D objects to life and turning them into stunning works of art.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Click and drag the left mouse button to mix the colors.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Challenge your creativity by experimenting with different color combinations.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Enjoy the satisfaction of crafting vibrant masterpieces in Merge World.
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Unleash your inner artist by blending colors to create stunning 3D art pieces.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Dive into an immersive and artistic experience that challenges your creativity.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Enjoy the satisfaction of crafting vibrant masterpieces in Merge World.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Merge World is easy to play, with simple controls that let you focus on your creativity.
